function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High-density living and overbuilding activity may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases in densely built spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Artificial intelligence and machine learning may not fully address the complex needs of designing self-sufficient and healthy living spaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Loss of green spaces and interaction with nature due to overbuilding and high-density living.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to monitor public health and government announcements can result in non-compliance with regulations and guidelines, leading to increased risk of contagious disease propagation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of policies mandating employees to refrain from work when symptomatic or exposed to covid-19 can result in workplace transmission of the virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate support for workers in the event of a positive covid-19 case can result in fear, stigma, and reluctance to report symptoms, leading to underreporting of cases and increased risk of transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to lack of safety measures in construction sites.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining regular communication and coordination among project teams due to social distancing measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of late or halted deliveries of materials from suppliers, impacting project timelines and progress.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive ranking of all identified actions and their impacts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapidly changing covid-19 pandemic situation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on preliminary data for decision-making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic effects on construction organizations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey data collection during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Specialization in industrial construction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific response plan and guidelines for construction organizations to address covid-19 pandemic issues.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited information on actions and policies implemented or suggested by construction and nonconstruction organizations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for inadequate data collection on covid-19 status and response measures in construction organizations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 among construction workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced investment and government spending on construction","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the construction industry due to the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on wastewater surveillance to estimate covid-19 presence and prevalence.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in correlating sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater with covid-19 prevalence due to various factors such as excretion differences, environmental variables, and unreported cases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discrepancies in rt-qpcr n1, n2, and n3 assays for water samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inhibitory effect of the matrix on rna detection in wastewater samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding infectivity of viral particles in sewage and feces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater samples indicating potential contamination and spread of covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing method limitations for viral concentration from water samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling sars-cov-2 in the laboratory environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of sars-cov-2 presence in water samples","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of influent and effluent water with mgv and pedv","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-significant differences in virus recovery rates between influent waters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant differences in virus recovery rates between effluent waters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of reaction mix due to incorrect handling or storage of reagents.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of outdated or expired reagents in the reaction mix.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of contaminated materials after the rt-pcr assay.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling and processing of wastewater and effluent water samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral rna extraction and quantification procedures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of rt-pcr for viral rna detection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of wastewater and effluent water with pedv and mgv viruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective concentration method leading to inaccurate virus detection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate safety measures during the concentration process leading to accidental exposure to viruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 rna detected in untreated wastewater samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Re-emerging zoonotic hepatitis e virus detected in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poliovirus detected during the global eradication programme","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of coronavirus through respiratory droplets and possibly via fecal-oral route.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in duration and magnitude of viral shedding in patients infected with sars-cov-2.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of coronavirus genetic material in wastewater, indicating potential environmental contamination and public health risks.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overfitting of the model due to prolonged training","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
